amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to strike the block grant program from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 108-232 to retain the base bill and keep all the changes to Title I; retain longstanding civil rights protections currently guaranteed to Head Start teachers, parents, and volunteers; and to remove the block grant from the underlying bill.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 229 (Roll no. 442).
